Package org.restlet.engine.header

Supports HTTP header parsing and formatting.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CacheDirectiveReader Cache directive header reader.
CacheDirectiveWriter Cache directive header writer.
ChallengeRequestReader Challenge request header reader.
ChallengeWriter Authentication challenge header writer.
ContentType Association of a media type, a character set and modifiers.
ContentTypeReader Content type header reader.
CookieReader Cookie header reader.
CookieSettingReader Cookie setting header reader.
CookieSettingWriter Cookie setting header writer.
CookieWriter Cookie header writer.
DateWriter Date header writer.
DimensionReader Dimension header reader.
DimensionWriter Dimension header writer.
DispositionReader Disposition header reader.
DispositionWriter Disposition header writer.
EncodingReader Encoding header reader.
EncodingWriter Encoding header writer.
ExpectationReader Expectation header reader.
ExpectationWriter Expectation header writer.
Header Represents an HTTP header.
HeaderConstants Constants related to the HTTP protocol.
HeaderReader<V> HTTP-style header reader.
HeaderUtils HTTP-style header utilities.
HeaderWriter<V> HTTP-style header writer.
LanguageReader Language header reader.
LanguageWriter Language header writer.
MetadataWriter<M extends Metadata> Metadata header writer.
MethodReader Method header reader.
MethodWriter Method header writer.

PreferenceWriter Preference header writer.
ProductReader User agent header reader.
ProductWriter User agent header writer.
RangeReader Range header reader.
RangeWriter Range header writer.
RecipientInfoReader Recipient info header reader.
RecipientInfoWriter Recipient info header writer.
TagWriter Tag header writer.
TokenReader Token header reader.
WarningReader Warning header reader.
WarningWriter Warning header writer.
 

Package org.restlet.engine.header Description

Supports HTTP header parsing and formatting.
